mapper.insert: insert into meeting (meetingname, roomid, reservationistid, numberofparticipants, starttime, endtime, reservationtime, canceledtime, description, status) values (#{meetingname},#{roomid},#{reservationistid},#{numberofparticipants},#{starttime},#{endtime},#{reservationtime},#{canceledtime},#{description},#{status})
mapper.select: SELECT meeting.meetingname, meetingroom.roomname, meeting.starttime, meeting.endtime, meeting.reservationtime, employee.employeename FROM meeting, meetingroom, employee where meeting.roomid = meetingroom.roomid and employee.employeeid = meeting.reservationistid
